Staked(address,bytes32,bytes32,address,u.details: emitted when user stakes an asset

params.depositTokenAmount0: how much deposit token0 was received
params.depositTokenAmount1: how much deposit token1 was received
params.receiptTokenAmount: how much of receipt token was received

Unstaked(address,bytes32,bytes32,address.details: emitted when user unstakes an asset

params.depositTokenAmount0: how much deposit token0 was received
params.depositTokenAmount1: how much deposit token1 was received
params.receiptTokenAmount: how much receipt token was unstaked

params.amount0Desired: amount of AVAX to be staked
params.amount0Min: minimum amount of AVAX to be staked
params.amount1Desired: amount of USDC to be staked
params.amount1Min: minimum amount of USDC to be staked*

params.amount0Desired: amount of BTC to be staked
params.amount0Min: minimum amount of BTC to be staked
params.amount1Desired: amount of AVAX to be staked
params.amount1Min: minimum amount of AVAX to be staked*

params.amount0Desired: amount of USDT.e to be staked
params.amount0Min: minimum amount of USDT.e to be staked
params.amount1Desired: amount of USDT to be staked
params.amount1Min: minimum amount of USDT to be staked*

params.amount0Min: minimum amount of AVAX to be unstaked
params.amount1Min: minimum amount of USDC to be unstaked*
params.liquidity: amount of shares to be unstaked

params.amount0Min: minimum amount of BTC to be unstaked
params.amount1Min: minimum amount of AVAX to be unstaked*
params.liquidity: amount of shares to be unstaked

params.amount0Min: minimum amount of USDT.e to be unstaked
params.amount1Min: minimum amount of USDT to be unstaked*
params.liquidity: amount of shares to be unstaked

stakeSteakHutAVAXUSDC(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Stakes in SteakHut AVAX/USDC balanced-wide pool

stakeSteakHutBTCAVAX(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Stakes in SteakHut BTC/AVAX balanced-wide pool

stakeSteakHutUSDTeUSDT(uint256,uint256,u.notice: Stakes in SteakHut USDT.e/USDT concentrated pool

unstakeSteakHutAVAXUSDC(uint256,uint256,.notice: Unstakes from SteakHut AVAX/USDC balanced-wide pool

unstakeSteakHutBTCAVAX(uint256,uint256,u.notice: Unstakes from SteakHut BTC/AVAX balanced-wide pool

unstakeSteakHutUSDTeUSDT(uint256,uint256.notice: Unstakes from SteakHut USDT.e/USDT concentrated pool
